result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alexander M. NOVAK

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.
State moves to dismiss and read in all counts.  The defendant plead to charges in 16 CF 750, 16 CF 603, 16 CF 491, 15 CF 560, 15 CF 457 and 15 CF 194.  Motion granted.
$100.00 cash bail is transferred to 15 CF 457 and held until sentencing in that case.
Minutes.
Plea date on December 21, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
Plea date on December 12, 2016 at 04:00 pm.
Plea date on November 30, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
Plea date on November 22, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
Plea date reset to 10-05-16 at 9:30 a.m.
Plea date on August 1, 2016 at 11:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Alexander M. NOVAK
Current: 3911 Rockwood Road, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 10-25-2015)
Prior: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220

$100.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.   
Notice to Party Furnishing Cash Bail Bond.

Stipulation and Order for Modification of Bail.
The Court does hereby reduce the cash bail from $4,000.00 to $100.00.  The court further orders that in the event the defendant leaves the Scottsdale Recovery Center prior to completion of the program, he shall return to the State of Wisconsin and the cash bail shall be reinstated to $4,000.00.  The Court further orders, as a condition of bail, that the defendant sign a release authorizing the Manitowoc County D.A.'s office to confirm that the defendant is actively participating in the Scottsdale Recovery Center Program.
Amended Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail issued.  Copy to jail.  Copy filed.
State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.

Defendant in custody.  
Defendant waives his right to a preliminary hearing.   Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 3 for further proceedings.   Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing.  
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.  Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 11-10-2015 at 4:00 p.m.   Plea Date is set for 02-17-2015 at 3:30 p.m.  
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.   
Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.    Preliminary hearing is set for 10-08-15 at 1:30 p.m.   
Minutes.

Defendant in custody.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of burglary, theft and bail jumping.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 09-28-15 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $4,000.00 cash with the conditions that he maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs and have no contact with MIchelle VanDeGrift, Mary Novak, Robert Novak and his residence at 3210 Shoto Road, Manitowoc, WI.  Bail not furnished and the defendant is remanded into custody. Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Minutes.
